metadata.Title: CVE-2013-3630 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Moodle through 2.5.2 allows remote authenticated administrators to execute arbitrary programs by configuring the aspell pathname and then triggering a spell-check operation within the TinyMCE editor.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
